jcr:content.jcr:title: United Nations Population Fund Goodwill Ambassador

contentheadline.headline: United Nations Population Fund Goodwill Ambassador

contentrichtext.text: '''UNFPA Goodwill Ambassadors''' are celebrity advocates of the [[United Nations Population Fund|United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA)]] and use their talent and fame to advocate for the human right of reproductive health. ==Current Goodwill Ambassadors== The current Goodwill Ambassadors, and the year they were appointed: * Goedele Liekens, for [[Belgium]] * [[Kattis AhlstrÃ¶m]], for [[Sweden]] * [[Hanne-Vibeke Holst]], for [[Denmark]] * [[Ashi Sangay Choden Wangchuck]], for [[Bhutan]] * [[Mikko Kuustonen]], for [[Finland]] (1998) * [[Geri Halliwell]], for the [[United Kingdom]] (1998) * [[Shabana Azmi]], for [[India]] (1998) * [[Mary Banotti]], for [[Ireland]] (1999) * [[Manisha Koirala]], for [[India]] and [[Nepal]] (1999) * [[Bertrand Piccard]], for [[Switzerland]] (1999) * [[Catarina Furtado]], for [[Portugal]] * [[Chea Samnang]], for [[Cambodia]] (2000) * [[Mpule Kwelagobe]], for [[South Africa]] (2000) * [[Lara Dutta]], for [[India]] (2001) * [[Alfred Biolek]], for [[Germany]] (2001) * Princess Basma Bint Talal (2001) * [[Yuko Arimori]], for [[Japan]] (2002) == See also == *[[FAO Goodwill Ambassador]]s *[[List of UNICEF Goodwill Ambassadors]] *[[UNESCO Goodwill Ambassador]] *[[UNHCR Goodwill Ambassador]] *[[UNIDO Goodwill Ambassador]] *[[WHO Goodwill Ambassador]] == External links == *[http://www.unfpa.org/ambassadors/index.htm UNFPA Goodwill Ambassadors] [[Category:United Nations General Assembly subsidiary organs]] [[Category:United Nations Population Fund|Goodwill]]
